definition: hardly/not in the least/not at all
hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan
accurate to perfection (idiom)/precise to the finest detail
to not mind (at all, a bit)/to not care in the slightest

sentences.english: “You don’t have to drop them off, ” Madeleine said, undeterred.
sentences.chinese: “你不用交給別人去洗，”瑪德琳毫不退縮地說。

sentences.english: His father did not hesitate to support and help him.
sentences.chinese: 李父毫不猶豫支持並扶持。

sentences.english: It was my neighbor’s wife! I rushed in without hesitation.
sentences.chinese: 原來是我鄰居的妻子在叫喚，我毫不猶豫的衝了過去。

sentences.english: Zhao Zigeng smiled, and did not care to verbal stimuli "."
sentences.chinese: 趙子庚笑笑，毫不在意並以言語刺激宇文。
它與上下文無關，並且毫不含糊。

sentences.english: Magdalena considered the past an irrelevant encumbrance.
sentences.chinese: 瑪格達萊娜把過去看作毫不相干的累贅。

sentences.english: I'm not ashamed of my incompetence in these areas.
sentences.chinese: 我對這些領域的無能無力毫不羞愧。

sentences.english: I could even examine the sheaf of bills without cringing.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至可以毫不畏懼地打開那一疊賬單了。

sentences.english: The Boxer Band tunes in to historyThe Boxers’ negative image in the West is of little concern.
sentences.chinese: 當地毫不在意義和團在西方人眼中的負面形象。

sentences.english: Worry so many senses, and not care secular reality.
sentences.chinese: 如此的多感善愁，毫不在意世俗。

sentences.english: Comments, industry leader who also makes no secret of their endeavors.
sentences.chinese: 言談中，行業領頭羊們也毫不諱言各自的努力方向。

sentences.english: I figured out this problem without any effort.
sentences.chinese: 我毫不費力地解決了這個問題。

sentences.english: And some people will study one thing and end up doing something totally different.
sentences.chinese: 還有一些人從事的職業和他們的專業毫不相關。

sentences.english: Lift your voice so that everyone can hear you with ease.
sentences.chinese: 把嗓門提高，讓大家都能毫不費力地聽清你的話。

sentences.english: Experience tells us that the answer is an unambiguous yes.
sentences.chinese: 經驗告訴我們答案是可以，毫不含糊。

sentences.english: And don't hesitate to dial 911 if you think you or another family member is in immediate danger.
sentences.chinese: 如果家中有人非常危險，請毫不遲疑地撥打911。

definition: not in the least/to completely lack
the slightest amount or degree/a bit
to sketch in light shades/to play down/to deemphasize (idiom)
in no way/not in the least/absolutely not
erhua variant of 一點|一点[yi1 dian3]
to pay no attention to/not to mind
